name: Midfield Aviation
about: Midfield Aviation, located at Apple Valley Airport in California, is a comprehensive flight school dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. We offer a range of programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Flight Instructor, and Instrument Rating, along with additional ground school and seminars. Our friendly and experienced staff are committed to accommodating busy schedules and ensuring a safe and seamless learning experience. With reasonable prices and a focus on customer satisfaction, Midfield Aviation is an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. We pride ourselves on creating a welcoming environment where students can thrive in their aviation careers.
services:

Intro Flight
